titles.title: A bill to amend the definition of "vessel of the United States" in the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Executive Comment Requested from Interior, Commerce, State.
Referred to Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment
committee.name: House Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 4/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act to revise the definition of "vessel of the United States." Provides that no vessel first documented after April 6, 1987, shall be considered a "vessel of the United States" unless such vessel is documented under specified laws relating to fishery licenses and registry which include considerations of where such vessel was built.
